text: Zadoku ũrĩa mũthĩnjĩri-Ngai akĩruta rũhĩa rwa maguta kuuma hema-inĩ ĩrĩa nyamũre1:39 Ĩno nĩ hema ĩrĩa Daudi aakire ya kũiga ithandũkũ rĩa Maathani, no ti Hema-ya-Gũtũnganwo ĩrĩa yarĩ Gibeoni (3:4; 2Sam 6:17). na agĩitĩrĩria Solomoni. Ningĩ makĩhuha karumbeta, nao andũ othe makĩanĩrĩra, makiuga atĩrĩ, “Mũthamaki Solomoni arotũũra nginya tene!”
